text: Stephen Dunham Dowers (September 14, 1964 - September 14, 2012) was an American movie and television actor. He was best known for his roles as Edward Pillows in DAG and as Peter in The Mummy. Bowers was born in Boston, Massachusetts. Bowers was married to Alexondra Lee. He died on his birthday on September 14, 2012 from a heart attack in his Burbank, California home, aged 48. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Boston
title: Stephen Dunham
